A tool for charities and social good organisations that helps guide through the process of writing stories about the people they work with

Get involved See the prototype

Tell your clients’ stories. Show your impact.

We’ve worked with a lot of charities They all have amazing stories to tell about the people they work with. Not all charities the content resources to show the world the difference they're making.

So we want to make the process of telling stories easy and rewarding by giving charities the tools to create the engaging, captivating stories they have.

Some of the things we’d like to include:

  • - Plain English recommendations
  • - Focussed writing modes
  • - Guided templates to help you create engaging content
  • - Exporting features.

Perhaps you have some suggestions too? Take our questionnaire.

We’ve made a prototype!

Have a look and tell us what you think

See the prototype
